deals.finePrint:

deals.highlightsHtml: Play music wirelessly anywhere in your house with this Bluetooth speaker, which reproduces rich audio for up to five hours per charge
deals.pitchHtml:
Any price comparison is to a new, nonrefurbished product price.

Harman Kardon Onyx Studio Bluetooth Speaker (Refurbished)

The powerful Onyx Studio reproduces music accurately with dual woofers and tweeters and two passive bass radiators, and streams music wirelessly from Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as smartphones and tablets.

Bluetooth: Stream Wireless Music, Internet Radio, and Podcasts
Bluetooth lets you stream wireless music from an enabled mobile device, leaving you free to mingle with guests, clean the house, or do yoga—all without interrupting the music. Moreover, Bluetooth plays your favorite songs over the system’s speakers, filling the room with richer sound than most smartphones, tablets, or laptops can.

Small Size, Big Sound
While compact speakers typically sacrifice bass response for portability, the Onyx Studio is equipped with two subwoofers and two passive bass radiators. This powerful combo fills any space with rich, resonant low notes that complement the crisp highs and help reproduce your favorite songs accurately.

Listen in Any Room
Designed as an audio solution for the entire home, the Onyx Studio is easy to carry between rooms so you can listen to music while working out, making dinner, or falling asleep. A built-in five-hour battery lets you use it away from the charger for long stretches of time, so you don’t have to worry about unplugging the speaker and plugging it back in every time you want to move.

Specifications

  • Streams music from Bluetooth-enabled devices
  • Bluetooth 3.0
  • Dual 3” woofers and 0.75” tweeters
  • Two passive bass radiators
  • Frequency response: 60Hz–20kHz
  • 4 x 15W bi-amplification
  • Built-in rechargeable 2,600mAh lithium ion battery
  • Battery life: up to five hours
  • Weight: 6.8lb
  • Dimensions: 12.8”x8.7”x13.6”
  • Condition: refurbished
  • 90 day warranty from USA Warranty
Bluetooth Speaker Buying Guide

Whether you need a speaker for your bedroom or for a backpacking kit, this guide will help you choose the right one.

For questions pertaining to this deal, click the Ask a Question button below. For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: All Pro 1080p Action Sports Camera with Waterproof Accessory Case
deals.pitchHtml:
Show off your active lifestyle with videos from the HD All Pro Action Sports Camera. This camera takes crisp 1080p video at a smooth 30fps, or 720p video at incredibly smooth and action-packed 60fps, perfect for catching every bit of the action on your adventures. Attach this camera to your arm, helmet, bike, or car and record every ride, run, and trick -- or attach the waterproof case and capture your water-based exploits!

  • Liquid Crystal Display (LCD): 1.5LTPS
  • 12MP HD wide-angle lens
  • Lens: 140 degrees + HD wide-angle lens, 6G lens 
  • Video resolution: 1080p (1920*1080) 30fps  /  720p (1280*720) 60fps 
  • Video format: MOV 
  • Video compression format: H.264
  • Resolution of photos: 12M (4000*3000) / 8M (3264*2448) /5M (2560*1920) / 2M (1920*1080) 
  • Storage: MicroSD card (not included); can accept cards up to 32GB
  • Shooting Mode: Single shot / Self-timer (5 seconds / 10 seconds / Double) 
  • Record while charging: Supported
  • Loop recording: Supported 
  • Video encryption: Supported
  • Optical source frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz 
  • USB interface: USB2.0 
  • Power source interface: 5V 1000mAh
  • Battery capacity: 3.7V Li-ion Battery 1500mAh 3.33W 
  • Recording time at 1080p: About 3 hours
  • Charging time: About 3.5 hours 
  • Operating systems supported: Windows XP / Vista or above / Win7 / Win 8 / Mac OS 
  • Dimensions: 2.33 x 1.62 x 1.15 inch
  • Waterproof rating: IPX 68 level 
  • Please note this model does not feature WiFi connectivity to record via an app, and you must supply your own microSD card.

deals.highlightsHtml: In-ear headphones isolate ambient noise from your favorite tunes, while in-line remote lets you adjust playback on the go
deals.pitchHtml:
Beats by Dr. Dre urBeats2 In-Ear Headphones (Refurbished A-Grade)

  • In-ear headphones
  • Precision-machined single-billet metal housing
  • Wired remote and microphone
  • Tangle-free cable

  • Grading: This device is in excellent cosmetic condition and is 100% functional as verified by highly trained technicians through multiple tests and inspections. The device has been thoroughly inspected, cleaned, refurbished as necessary, and is backed by a 30-day replacement warranty.
  • For warranty information, contact customer support

Beats by Dr. Dre, the b logo, BeatsAudio, Solo, UrBeats, and Powerbeats are all trademarks of Beats Electronics, LLC and/or Apple, Inc.

About Beats by Dr. Dre

With six Grammys and a career spanning more than two decades, Dr. Dre knows music. As a rapper and seasoned producer, he also knows exactly what that music should sound like, even when it’s piped through speakers and headphones. That’s why, in 2006, he partnered with record executive Jimmy Iovine to develop a stylish line of headphones that would re-create the lush, crystal-clear sounds of the studio. In the words of Dre, “With Beats, people are going to hear what the artists hear.” And with revenues surpassing the $1 billion mark, it seems that people like what they’re hearing.

The line has expanded over the years and now includes over-ear headphones, earbuds, and the Beats Pill—a small but loud speaker with a sleek, capsule-like design. Beats also collaborates with artists, musicians, and brands to create eye-catching limited-edition lines. Past collaborators include Lady Gaga, Hello Kitty, and Fendi, among many others.

deals.highlightsHtml: IPX4 waterproof speaker mounts to flat surfaces to stream music, podcasts, and calls from Bluetooth-enabled devices
deals.pitchHtml:
Aduro AQUASound Bluetooth Shower Speaker with Mic and Controls

This suction-mounted speaker livens up showers and other splash-prone activities with music.

Waterproof Design
The speaker is IPX4 waterproof, so you can safely mount it in the shower, by the swimming pool, or on a boat without worrying about splashes.

Hands-Free Calls
Answer calls and have conversations via the speaker’s built-in microphone, which is great for proving to talent agents that you really do sing best in the shower. The microphone also works with the Siri voice assistant for iOS.

On-Unit Controls
Control the music without hopping out of the shower. The unit has controls to skip tracks, pause and restart, or go forward and back.

Specifications

  • Product number: WSP20
  • Compatible with Bluetooth-enabled media players, phones
  • Works with Siri
  • On-unit controls: skip, forward, back, pause, play
  • Answer calls with built-in microphone
  • Suction cup attaches to walls, flat surfaces
  • Use in showers, baths, swimming pools, or boats
  • IPX4 waterproof * Dimensions: 7”x5”x2”
  • Weight: 8oz.
  • Condition: new
  • 1-Year warranty from Aduro
Bluetooth Speaker Buying Guide

Whether you need a speaker for your bedroom or for a backpacking kit, this guide will help you choose the right one.

For questions pertaining to this deal, click the Ask a Question button below. For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

deals.highlightsHtml: Samsung Fast Adaptive Charger 2Pack with 2 Micro OR USB-C Cables
deals.pitchHtml:
• 2 CHARGER SET • 
This Kit includes TWO ORIGINAL Samsung EP-TA20JWE Fast Charging Adapter Travel Chargers + your choice of either TWO ECB-DU4EWE Full Power Micro USB 2.0 Data Sync cables OR TWO EP-DG950CBE USB C cables. 

  • • ADAPTIVE FAST CHARGER •
  • With this Samsung EP-TA20JWE Adaptive Fast Charging technology your battery can go from zero to up to 60% battery level in about 30 minutes, so you can charge up fast, even during shorter car rides. Sync and transfer files via Micro-USB/USB-C data cables. Works with Adaptive Fast Charging (AFC) compatible devices: Galaxy S7, S7 Edge, Note 4, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge, S6 Edge +, S8, S8+, Note 8, S9 and S9+
  • • DETACHABLE Micro USB or Type C cable •
  • Detachable full power USB to Micro USB 2.0  Or USB to Type-C cable that allows you to charge via any or other USB power source if you aren't near a wall outlet
  • • UNIVERSAL CHARGING •
  • This charger set charges all other non-fast devices as well. It will charge USB 2.0 phones and tablets that use Micro USB cable at their normal speed. Syncs and transfers files via Micro USB or USB C data cable.
  • • COMPATIBILITY •
  • Micro USB - Compatible AFC Fast Charge Devices: Galaxy Note 4 / Note 5 / S6 / S7 / S7 Edge. Also compatible with non-AFC Micro 11 pin devices such as Galaxy S / S2 / S3 / S4 / Note 3 / Tab 3 / Tab 4 / Nexus 7
  • USB Type C - Compatible AFC Fast Charge Devices: Galaxy S8, S8+, Note 8, S9 and S9+

deals.highlightsHtml: Wireless Bluetooth headset floods ears with rich stereo sound and lets you take calls using clear dual MEMS mics
deals.pitchHtml:
LG Tone Infinim HBS-910 or HBS-920 Tone Infinim Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headset

Wireless Convenience
  • Listen wirelessly to your smartphone’s vast music library
  • Take calls and chat with friends using clear dual MEMS microphones
  • Qualcomm AptX technology helps improve call sound quality
  • User-friendly playback controls on left and right side of headset
  • Hands-free calling
  • Built-in mic
  • For warranty information, contact customer support
Seamless Fit
  • Designed to curve securely around the neck and stay comfortable over time
  • Retractable earbuds
  • Lightweight design helps avoid irritation
Rich Sound
  • Advanced Quad-Layer Speaker Technology for layered sound
  • Rich bass from Harman Kardon Signature Sound quality
LG HBS-910 Tone Infinim Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headset (Open Box)
  • Up to 10.5 hours of wireless music time
  • Up to 16 hours of talk time
  • Bluetooth 4.1
  • Product dimensions: 1.5”x6.9”x8”
  • Weight: 1.8 oz
  • Product condition: open box

LG HBS-920 Tone Infinim Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headset (Open Box)

  • Up to 12 hours of wireless music time
  • Up to 15 hours of talk time
  • Bluetooth 4.2
  • Product dimensions: 0.6” x 7.1” x 6.3”
  • Weight: 1.9 oz
  • Product condition: open box

About LG

At LG, technology alone isn’t enough to make a product great; it must also incorporate a stylish, ergonomic design that makes it a joy to use. This focus has earned the company the 2011 International Forum (iF) design award for products including a compact lightwave oven that fits into narrow spaces, and a slim, metal-framed LED TV. LG also maintains an impressive list of industry firsts: it developed the world’s first 60” plasma TV, internet-connected refrigerator, and dual-core smartphone.

Headphone Buying Guide

Explore the basic shapes, functions, and features of different types of headphones to find the pair that's right for you.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

Sold by Groupon Goods. View the FAQ to learn more.

  • Cards must be redeemed on xbox.com from a computer; not redeemable through Xbox console.
  • Some cards may arrive in Spanish; all cards are still redeemable on xbox.com regardless of language printed on the card.
  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Canada/Puerto Rico.
  • Most orders are delivered within 7 business days from the purchase date. Shipping questions?

deals.highlightsHtml: 12-month subscription to Xbox Live Gold enables advanced multiplayer options and provides access to free and discounted games
deals.pitchHtml:
12-Month Xbox Live Gold Membership

  • Card for a 12-month subscription to Xbox Live Gold
  • Provides access to free games and exclusive member discounts
  • Enables online multiplayer and matchmaking
  • Multiplayer network powered by over 300,000 servers
  • Cloudhosted multiplayer helps eliminate lag and cheating
  • Compatible with Xbox 360 and Xbox One

How to Redeem

  1. Once your card has arrived, visit Xbox.com/redeemcode from your computer (not redeemable on the Xbox console).
  2. Log into your Xbox Live account
  3. Enter your 25-character token code. Don’t worry about hyphens; the system will take care of those for you.
  4. Click “Redeem Code.” You’ll receive a confirmation message.

Note: some membership cards may be printed in Spanish. The codes will work regardless of the printed language on the card.

For post-purchase inquiries, please contact customer support.

View the Goods FAQ to learn more.
